programme.title: All About ING
programme.desc: The story of three family members confronting the fatal disease of the father, Weiming. When the mother, Muling, occupies herself with caring for the family, the son Yiming feels lost and vacillates between escaping or staying.

programme.title: Explore China Shorts
programme.desc: Go inside The Forbidden City and learn about it's history.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Shi Qiang is still in the hospital. Wang Miao joins the scientific advisory group as they continue to interrogate Ye Wen Jie. She tells them of how she first met Evans in a remote mountainous area.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Ye Wen Jie shocks everyone with the revelation that six years ago, two protons were launched into the solar system to lock up the progress of human science. Wang Miao requests to speak to Ye Wen Jie alone and asks further questions about Yang Dong.

programme.title: My Guardian Angels
programme.desc: Xie Ning cannot accept the fact that Dong Yu will become her father. Mandy rejects Dong Yu for her daughter's sake. Dong Yu tells Mandy to give each other time instead. They decide to maintain a distance to avoid agitating Xie Ning. However, Xie Ning finds out, causing a conflict between herself and Mandy.

programme.title: My Guardian Angels
programme.desc: Mandy gets into a car accident but survives. For Xie Ning's sake, Dong Yu chooses to leave and work overseas, but Mandy is unable to forget him. Miao Miao actively fights her cancer. Xie Ying gives birth to a girl after her marriage with Gui Qiang. Si Jin and Kai Wei enter the marriage hall with many blessings, but receive a message that there is an earthquake in Sichuan where Dong Yu is.

programme.title: All About ING
programme.desc: The story of three family members confronting the fatal disease of the father, Weiming. When the mother, Muling, occupies herself with caring for the family, the son Yiming feels lost and vacillates between escaping or staying.

programme.desc: Hal tries his hand at making the Frog Style Dumplings. (Part 1)

programme.title: Longxing Northern Expedition
programme.desc: During the Song Dynasty, in a desperate situation spanning 800 miles, a young hero and his companions join forces with General Li Xianzhong to launch a prosperous northern expedition, reclaiming lost territories.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: The University of Chicago integrates art into education, daily life, community engagement, and cultural preservation through its world-class resources, while actively engaging outstanding students in art appreciation and analysis.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Xie Wan Ru deliberately flaunts her pregnancy at a palace banquet in an attempt to annoy Wang Xuan.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Wang Qian receives a plan from the Queen to avoid the marriage to Xiao Qi and uses Xie Wan Ru's ointment to capture him.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne
programme.desc: Yau’s United Group Ltd. third generation Yau Ho-yee is a capable person.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne
programme.desc: On the first day of assuming the position of acting chairman, Ho-yee is taken to the police station to assist in investigation as she is implicated in a fraud and document forgery case.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: A hard drive containing a client for the Three-Body game is found in the main control room of the dismantled Judgment Day. In the game, Listener No. 1379 recounts the the first time he received the message from Hong An introducing Earth.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Shi Qiang and Wang Miao continue the game and learn that the Three-Body Listening Station, like the Red Bank Base on Earth, monitors information from space. The Trisolaren announces that a fleet is heading towards Earth.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Lin Li, a creative director at a beauty company, is a strong-willed career woman with a vulnerable side. One day, her boss unexpectedly decides to engage a young Internet celebrity to compete with her. Lin Li is then dealt with another blow when she discovers that her husband Chen Shi is having an extramarital affair.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Lin Li's daughter Si Yuan finds out that her father is having an affair with tutor Yu Ting. Unable to forgive her father, Si Yuan wrecks Yu Ting's laptop. Lin Li presses Chen Shi about his affair and he insists that their marriage has long had problems. Lin Li goes to the playground where Dong Sheng recognises her as the big sister who helped him when he was a kid.

programme.desc: First Robotics Competition is a significant championship that encourages middle school students to learn and practice the techniques of robot development. It also offers the participants an excellent advantage for college admissions.

programme.desc: Invited by Taiwanese immigrant couple Ming and Michelle Hsu, Noelle gets to hear their memories of Taiwanese Bento Box while tasting classic Taiwanese street food.
